Name: Magic and Elements
About the game: Magic and elements is a 2d shooter in the arena, you are the greatest magician of all time going through another test, once in the arena of four elements you have to go through many levels, in this arena you can use only 4 elements: Fire, water, earth, air. Your opponents are very good at these skills as well as countering them. Collect spells and attack, or collect a protection spell from each element and defend yourself, the main goal is to defeat all the evil Bosses. Features: Music by Leuolo Strong Graphics by NONSOUL
